verses.quote: â€œIndeed, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSo which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whatever of blessings and good things you have, it is from Allah.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSay, 'In the bounty of Allah and in His mercyâ€” in that let them rejoice; it is better than what they accumulate.'â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd those who strive for Us â€“ We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œWhoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while being a believer â€“ those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged, [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œEnter Paradise, you and your kindred, delighted.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œThose who have believed and whose descendants followed them in faith â€“ We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, Allah does not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd it is He who has made you successors upon the earth and has raised some of you above others in degrees [of rank] that He may try you through what He has given you. Indeed, your Lord is swift in penalty; but indeed, He is Forgiving and Merciful.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œFor indeed, with hardship [will be] ease. Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œNo fatigue, nor disease, nor sorrow, nor sadness, nor hurt, nor distress befalls a Muslim... but that Allah expiates some of his sins.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œDo not lose hope, nor be sad.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, but give good tidings to the patient.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, Allah is with the patient.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œO you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd He it is who makes [one] laugh and weep.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd [Allah] has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and hearts that you might give thanks.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSo whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it, and whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œWho restrain anger and who pardon the peopleâ€”And Allah loves the doers of good.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace,â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever is patient and forgives â€“ indeed, that is of the matters [requiring] determination.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œRepel evil with that which is better. We are most knowing of what they describe.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSo remember Me; I will remember you. And be thankful to Me and do not deny Me.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œO you who have believed, do not let the hatred of a people prevent you from being just. Be just; that is nearer to righteousness.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œThe good deed and the evil deed cannot be equal. Repel [evil] by that [deed] which is better; and thereupon the one whom between you and him is enmity [will become] as though he was a devoted friend.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while being a believer â€“ those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged, [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd let not those of virtue among you and wealth swear not to give [aid] to their relatives and the needy and the emigrants for the cause of Allah, and let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSay, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector.' And upon Allah let the believers rely.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAllah is the ally of those who fear Him, and He brings them out from darknesses into the light.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever relies upon Allah â€“ then He is sufficient for him.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will pardon him his sins and make great for him His rewards.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews or Christians or Sabeans â€“ those [among them] who believed in Allah and the Last Day and did righteousness â€“ no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œWhoever desires the reward of this world - then with Allah is the reward of this world and the Hereafter. And ever is Allah Hearing and Seeing.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œBut perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you; and perhaps you love a thing and it is bad for you. Allah knows, while you know not.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, but give good tidings to the patient.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, Allah is with the patient.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œO you who have believed, do not let the hatred of a people prevent you from being just. Be just; that is nearer to righteousness.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œOur Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we forget or make a mistake. Our Lord, and lay not upon us a burden like that which You laid upon those before us. Our Lord, and burden us not with that which we have no ability to bear.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSo exalted is Allah when you reach the evening and when you reach the morning.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, Allah does not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd it is He who created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever desires the reward of this world - then with Allah is the reward of this world and the Hereafter. And ever is Allah Hearing and Seeing.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSo whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it, and whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd when My servants ask you concerning Me â€“ indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œO mankind, there has come to you a conclusive proof from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a clear light.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œDo you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and made it flow as springs in the earth?â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd it is He who has made you successors upon the earth and has raised some of you above others in degrees [of rank] that He may try you through what He has given you.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSay, 'Are those who know equal to those who do not know?' Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever disbelieves in the verses of Allah will not have any protector or any helper.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever relies upon Allah â€“ then He is sufficient for him.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will pardon him his sins and make great for him His rewards.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and hearts that you might give thanks.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIf you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor].â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whatever of blessings and good things you have, it is from Allah.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSo remember Me; I will remember you. Be thankful to Me and do not deny Me.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd Allah loves the grateful.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œWhoever is grateful, his gratitude is only for [the benefit of] himself.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe.'â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œWhoever desires the reward of this world - then with Allah is the reward of this world and the Hereafter. And ever is Allah Hearing and Seeing.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSo whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it, and whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd it is He who has made you successors upon the earth and has raised some of you above others in degrees [of rank] that He may try you through what He has given you.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and hearts that you might give thanks.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œDo not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while being a believer â€“ those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged, [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd it is He who accepts repentance from His servants and pardons misdeeds, and He knows what you do.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever repents and does righteousness has indeed turned to Allah with [accepted] repentance.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSay, 'O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.'â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews or Christians or Sabeans â€“ those [among them] who believed in Allah and the Last Day and did righteousness â€“ no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will pardon him his sins and make great for him His rewards.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong themselves [by transgression], remember Allah and seek forgiveness for their sins â€“ and who can forgive sins except Allah? â€“ and [who] do not persist in what they have done while they know.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd those who strive for Us â€“ We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œTake advantage of five before five: your youth before your old age, your health before your sickness, your wealth before your poverty, your free time before your preoccupation, and your life before your death.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while being a believer â€“ those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged, [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, Allah does not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd whoever fears Allah â€“ He will make for him a way out and will provide for him from where he does not expect.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œAnd Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and hearts that you might give thanks.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œSo whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it, and whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews or Christians or Sabeans â€“ those [among them] who believed in Allah and the Last Day and did righteousness â€“ no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œWhoever desires the reward of this world - then with Allah is the reward of this world and the Hereafter. And ever is Allah Hearing and Seeing.â€
verses.author: Quran

verses.quote: â€œIndeed, Allah does not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.â€
